name: Phantom Heart
description:
Phantom Heart - an action-horror game that follows the genre Murder Everyone where you play as Violet, a girl who makes a deal with a shadow demon to haunt the boarding school and take revenge on those who wronged her.

  • Details:

As Violet, you must navigate through the halls of the school, now overrun by demonic forces under your control. You must turn crosses upside down, absorb your classmates souls and finally, destroy the priest who guards the school of evil forces, in this case, YOU.

  • Controls:

Keyboard and mouse. Use W A S D to move, and Mouse LEFT and RIGHT click to attack and transform into a shadow demon. Use Q to stun the priest and gain time to spread chaos and evil!

So what are you waiting for? Join Violet on her descent into darkness in "Phantom Heart" and experience the thrill of becoming the villain in this twisted tale of horror!
